trans-unit.source: Represents a table in the data store.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable> class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable> class represents a single table in the data store.

A collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable> objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Tables?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable"></xref> class with the specified name.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable"></xref> class with the specified name and owner.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of relationship objects.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable.CreateRelationships%2A> method is called the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable.Relationships%2A> property is accessed, to populate the collection of data table relationships.
Gets a collection of relationships defined for a table.
A relationship describes a link between two tables in a data store.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTable.Relationships%2A> property returns a collection that represents all the relationships between this table and other tables in the data store.
